de.stroeer.proxity.services.tasks.common

Class AbstractBulkTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.match2blue.matooi.client.queue.tasks.AbstractTask<java.lang.Void>
      • de.stroeer.proxity.services.tasks.common.AbstractBulkTask
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LoadAllDataTask, LoadAroundMeDataTask

    public abstract class AbstractBulkTask
extends com.match2blue.matooi.client.queue.tasks.AbstractTask<java.lang.Void>
    Created by mfriedl on 07.04.14.

    extend this class to fire several Requests in a row
    - override initRequests() and use addRequest(AbstractTask) to setup the requests you want to fire
    - loadData(com.match2blue.matooi.client.service.AbstractService) will be called in onRun(AbstractService service) and fire the requests one after another
    - this request will also return in success though some subrequests may have failed, the result paramater is boolean, it will tell you the real result
